snippet: The blue-chip index added to its record levels, though the overall market showed scant gains.
abstract: Dow Jones industrial average rises slightly to another record high, though the overall market shows scant gains.
lead_paragraph: The blue-chip index added to its record levels, though the overall market showed scant gains.

headline.main: Hints of a Jobs Uptick Help Buoy the Market
